channel.title: Paris on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Paris on mattischrome

item.title: Dithering Around
item.description: While off sick and under the weather I decided to play around with presenting the photos on this blog in a fashion more in keeping with the current Hugo theme.

item.title: In Praise of Paris
item.description: This time last year, Ingrid and I were on the Eurostar to Paris for four days. We did so much in our time there that I couldn’t write about it at the time. Here’s a little summary with a few photos.
